name: jate
description: An in-browser text editor that will also work when the internet is offline!

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install --only=dev --dev
